text:
Named for the light gray slate roofs on many of the buildings, [[Fairhaven]]'s Whiteroof
Ward handles much of the cityâ€™s river shipping. A
rough-and-tumble part of town, Whiteroof is home to a large community of [[Khoravar|half-elf]] who descend from the earliest inhabitants of the city. Dressed flamboyantly in loose clothing reminiscent of [[Valaes Tairn]] dress, these quixotic, itinerant "river elves" are fishers, ferry folk, shippers, and even pirates on the [[Aundair River]]. River elves are vibrant and independent, and they are savvy and bold in business and other interpersonal dealings. Anyone who needs to move something in or out of [[Fairhaven]] without the notice
of the authorities can turn to the river elves of Whiteroof. The half-elves also look to the protection of their kind, and they have a reputation for duping the
unwary. 

!! Noteworthy Locations

* ''The Hooked Inn''
* ''The Tipsy Nixie'' (tavern)
* ''Riverside Supply'' (shop)
* The [[Underquay]]
* [[Vorenn's Walk]]
title: Whiteroof Ward
